channel.title: Xchat outdated app still considered safe to use?
channel.description:
as xchat is installed by default inside whonix , i wonder is it safe to keep it inside whonix because the project is dead from 5 years ago.
check the last update:- http://xchat.org/
so here is the alternative of it:- https://hexchat.github.io/index.html
also read:- https://hexchat.github.io/news/announcement.html

item.title: Xchat outdated app still considered safe to use?
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Still considered as safe as any package from Debian. Search the issue tracker first:
https://phabricator.whonix.org/T40

Read full topic
item.source: Xchat outdated app still considered safe to use?
